string-array.item: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.ğŸ¤©ğŸ¤©
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.ğŸ¤œğŸ¤œ
Itâ€™s hard to beat a person who never gives up.ğŸ˜€
Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.ğŸ˜‰
Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen.
If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.
Hold the vision, trust the process.
Donâ€™t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
People who wonder if the glass is half empty or full miss the point. The glass is refillable.
One day or day one. You decide.
No one is to blame for your future situation but yourself. If you want to be successful, then become â€˜Successful.
Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
Invest in your dreams. Grind now. Shine later.
Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
Work like there is someone working 24 hours a day to take it away from you.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
If youâ€™re offered a seat on a rocket ship, donâ€™t ask what seat! Just get on.ğŸ‘Œ
Very often, a change of self is needed more than a change of sceneğŸ‘Š
The hard days are what make you stronger.ğŸ‘
If you believe itâ€™ll work out, youâ€™ll see opportunities. If you donâ€™t believe itâ€™ll work out, youâ€™ll see obstacles.âœŒ
Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.ğŸ’ª
You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.ğŸ‘‘
ouâ€™ve got to get up every morning with determination if youâ€™re going to go to bed with satisfaction.ğŸ’ª
I now tried a new hypothesis: It was possible that I was more in charge of my happiness than I was allowing myself to be.âœŒ
In a gentle way, you can shake the world.ğŸ‘Œ
If opportunity doesnâ€™t knock, build a door.ğŸ˜€
Donâ€™t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.ğŸ˜‰
Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.ğŸ‘Š
If everything seems to be under control, youâ€™re not going fast enough.ğŸ‘‘
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.ğŸ˜Š
The only difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.âœŒ
The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.ğŸ‘Œ
Never stop doing your best just because someone doesnâ€™t give you credit.ğŸ‘
Sometimes when youâ€™re in a dark place you think youâ€™ve been buried but youâ€™ve actually been planted.ğŸ˜€
Donâ€™t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.ğŸ˜‰
Whenever you find yourself doubting how far you can go, just remember how far you have come.ğŸ’ª
Good. Better. Best. Never let it rest. â€™Til your good is better and your better is bestğŸ‘Œ
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.ğŸ‘Š
Dreams donâ€™t work unless you do.ğŸ‘‘
Turn your wounds into wisdom.ğŸ’ª
When you have a dream, youâ€™ve got to grab it and never let go.ğŸ‘
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says â€™Iâ€™m possible!â€™ğŸ˜Š
There is nothing impossible to they who will try.ğŸ‘Œ
The bad news is time flies. The good news is youâ€™re the pilot.ğŸ‘‘
Life has got all those twists and turns. Youâ€™ve got to hold on tight and off you go.ğŸ’ª
Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.ğŸ‘
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.âœŒ
You define your own life. Donâ€™t let other people write your script.ğŸ‘Œ
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.ğŸ˜‰
At the end of the day, whether or not those people are comfortable with how youâ€™re living your life doesnâ€™t matter. What matters is whether youâ€™re comfortable with it.ğŸ‘Š
Spread love everywhere you go.ğŸ‘‘
You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.ğŸ˜‰
What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you. ğŸ‘Œ
Belief creates the actual fact.ğŸ‘Š
No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.ğŸ‘‘
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.ğŸ¦¾
Believe you can and youâ€™re halfway thereğŸ’ª
Weaknesses are just strengths in the wrong environment.ğŸ‘
Just donâ€™t give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I donâ€™t think you can go wrong.âœŒ
Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.ğŸ‘Œ
In a gentle way, you can shake the world.ğŸ˜Š
Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happenâ€”that stillness becomes a radiance.ğŸ¦¾
All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.ğŸ‘‘
Try to be a rainbow in someoneâ€™s cloud.âœŒ
